doctor_utters: [ask] How may I help you today?
[ask] Do you have shortness of breath?
[ask] Do you have sore throat, runny nose, or nasal congestion?
[ask] Do you have a burning sensation that starts in your stomach then goes up into your throat, and can be associated with a bitter taste in your mouth?
[ask] Have you noticed any changes in your voice like hoarseness?
[ask] Have you been in contact with people with similar symptoms in the past 2 weeks?
[inform] Based on your description, the most likely diagnosis is Acute laryngitis.
patient_utters: Yes, I have a sore throat.
Yes, I have noticed that the tone of my voice has become deeper, softer or hoarse.
Yes, I have had a cold in the last 2 weeks.
